dbml.help: convert the conceptual model into a relational schema in DBML format

sql.help: convert the conceptual model into a physical model for SQL

debug.help: list internal informations relative to the conversion into relational schema

dependencies.help: convert the conceptual model into a dependency graph

diagram.help: convert the conceptual model into a relational diagram in Mocodo syntax

html.help: convert the conceptual model into a relational schema in HTML format

latex.help: convert the conceptual model into a relational schema in LaTeX format

markdown.help: convert the conceptual model into a relational schema in Markdown format

mssql.help: convert the conceptual model into a physical model for Microsoft SQL Server

mysql.help: convert the conceptual model into a physical model for MySQL

oracle.help: convert the conceptual model into a physical model for Oracle

postgresql.help: convert the conceptual model into a physical model for PostgreSQL

sqlite.help: convert the conceptual model into a physical model for SQLite

text.help: convert the conceptual model into a relational schema in text format
